channel.title: Draftjs on Peace in Mind
channel.description: Recent content in Draftjs on Peace in Mind

item.title: Challenge with Draft JS
item.description: One week ago, I had to implement Rich Text editor as one of features in my school project. After searching, I found draft-js. It supports react very well. It looked so cool. So I decided to integrate it to my project. During that integration and studying, I struggled lots - from setting a simple editor to add more advanced features for it. It was a really amazing journey to acknowledge myself.
